Landing.heroSubtitle: Access a marketplace of pre-built, secure AI agents. From SEO experts to Data Analysts, hire your digital workforce in seconds.
Landing.featuresSubtitle: We bridge the gap between AI potential and business reality.
Landing.ctaSubtitle: Join thousands of businesses using VieAgent to scale their operations with AI.

t1.name: Sarah Chen
t1.content: VieAgent completely transformed how we handle SEO. The formatting agent alone saved us 20 hours a week.

t2.name: Michael Ross
t2.content: The ability to run complex data extraction flows securely without managing infrastructure is a game changer.

t3.name: Jessica Wu
t3.content: I hired my entire support team here. The response agents are indistinguishable from humans.

prebuilt.title: Pre-Built Agents
prebuilt.desc: Skip the prompting. Use agents that are already optimized for production use cases.

vault.title: Secure Vault
vault.desc: Your API keys (OpenAI, Gemini) are encrypted with AES-256. We never see them.

instant.title: Instant Execution
instant.desc: Run agents directly from your dashboard with a simple form interface.

enterprise.title: Enterprise Grade
enterprise.desc: Role-based access control, usage tracking, and team management built-in.

Marketplace.subtitle: Discover AI Agents to automate your workflow.
Marketplace.checkBack: Check back later for new tools.
